Key Match Events: Riley O'Brien gave up a gut-wrenching two-run home run to NY catcher Austin Wells in the bottom of the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Cardinals' loss hurt their playoff chances and extended a surprising franchise record of 0-4 at the current Yankee Stadium
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals have yet to win a game at the current Yankee Stadium

Cardinals Hall of Fame right-handed pitcher Bob Gibson gave up zero earned runs on six hits, 13 strikeouts and two walks in 10 innings pitched to help St. Louis seal its last victory at Yankees stadium
